Financials

The Berkeley Masjid Foundation (BMF) is a non-profit, tax exempt corporation (tax ID 94-3191601). The current focus of the organization is the completion of the Berkeley Masjid construction. The following is a current account of the project finance, updated on a monthly basis. For more detailed and month-by-month information, please contact us.

  • AT A GLANCE

      

    $430,000Funds needed to complete construction as of 10/2009
    $120,000Additional funds needed. Estimate revised in 2/2011
    -$416,763Funds raised since 10/2009
    ---------------- 
    $133,237Remaining construction cost
